Package org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.rest

Class ApplicationV1FilterTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.rest.ApplicationV1FilterTransformer
  • public class ApplicationV1FilterTransformer
extends Object
    Transformer for the ApplicationV1Filter, to ensure that we get the responses in the correct v1 format.

      Transforms a response to be v1 compliant.
      void transformJson​(org.forgerock.json.JsonValue jsonValue, Subject callingSubject, String realm)
      Given the json representation of an application swaps out the resource type UUIDs for a set of actions and resources that is the union of actions and resources represented by the associated resource types.

    • Method Detail

      • transformJson

        public void transformJson​(org.forgerock.json.JsonValue jsonValue,
                          Subject callingSubject,
                          String realm)
                   throws EntitlementException
        Given the json representation of an application swaps out the resource type UUIDs for a set of actions and resources that is the union of actions and resources represented by the associated resource types.
        Parameters:
        jsonValue - application json
        callingSubject - the calling subject
        realm - the realm
        Throws:
        EntitlementException - should an error occur during transformation

      • transform

        public org.forgerock.util.promise.Promise<org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceResponse,​org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException> transform​(org.forgerock.util.promise.Promise<org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceResponse,​org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException> promise,
                                                                                                                                                      org.forgerock.services.context.Context context)
        Transforms a response to be v1 compliant.
        Parameters:
        promise - The current response.
        context - Context of the request.
        Returns:
        a v1 compliant response-promise.

      • transform

        public org.forgerock.util.promise.Promise<org.forgerock.json.resource.QueryResponse,​org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException> transform​(org.forgerock.util.promise.Promise<org.forgerock.json.resource.QueryResponse,​org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException> promise,
                                                                                                                                                   org.forgerock.services.context.Context context,

                                                                                                                                                   org.forgerock.json.resource.QueryResourceHandler handler,
                                                                                                                                                   Collection<org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceResponse> resources)
        Transforms a response to a query to be v1 compliant.
        Parameters:
        promise - The current response.
        context - Context of the request.
        request - The request.
        handler - Query resource handler.
        resources - The collection of resources to respond.
        Returns:
        a v1 compliant response-promise.
